Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
SMTP server handler interfaces.

This package contains the staged handler interfaces used to process SMTP sessions. The handler pattern provides type-safe protocol flow where each interface represents a stage in the SMTP transaction.

Handler Interfaces (what you implement)

These interfaces define callbacks your handler receives at each protocol stage:

  • ClientConnected - Entry point for new connections
  • HelloHandler - Receives HELO/EHLO, TLS notifications, authenticated Principal
  • MailFromHandler - Receives MAIL FROM commands
  • RecipientHandler - Receives RCPT TO, DATA/BDAT
  • MessageDataHandler - Receives message content and completion

State Interfaces (provided by SMTPConnection)

These interfaces are passed to your handler callbacks, allowing you to accept or reject each protocol element:

  • ConnectedState - Accept/reject initial connection
  • HelloState - Accept/reject HELO/EHLO greeting
  • AuthenticateState - Accept/reject authenticated Principal
  • MailFromState - Accept/reject message sender
  • RecipientState - Accept/reject recipients
  • MessageStartState - Accept/reject message data phase
  • MessageEndState - Accept/reject completed message
  • ResetState - Handle RSET command

Protocol Mechanics Handled by Connection

The following are handled automatically by SMTPConnection, with the handler receiving only policy-relevant notifications:

  • STARTTLS - Accepted automatically if TLS is configured. Handler receives HelloHandler.tlsEstablished(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.TLSInfo) notification.
  • SASL Authentication - Challenge/response exchange handled by connection. Handler receives HelloHandler.authenticated(java.security.Principal, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.AuthenticateState) with the authenticated Principal.

Factory Interface

The ClientConnectedFactory creates new handler instances for each incoming connection. Configure this on the SMTP server: 


 <server class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.SMTPServer">
   <property name="handlerFactory" ref="#myHandlerFactory"/>
 </server>
Author:
Chris Burdess

    Package
    Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
    Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client
    Non-blocking SMTP client for sending outbound email.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    AuthenticateState
    Operations available when responding to successful SASL authentication.
    ClientConnected
    Entry point handler for new SMTP client connections.
    ClientConnectedFactory
    Factory for creating ClientConnected handler instances.
    ConnectedState
    Operations available immediately after a client connection is established.
    HelloHandler
    Handler for client greeting commands (HELO/EHLO) and pre-mail commands.
    HelloState
    Operations available when responding to HELO/EHLO.
    MailFromHandler
    Handler for MAIL FROM commands.
    MailFromState
    Operations for responding to MAIL FROM.
    MessageDataHandler
    Handler for message content and completion.
    MessageEndState
    Operations for finalizing message acceptance.
    MessageStartState
    Operations for responding to DATA/BDAT initiation.
    RecipientHandler
    Handler for RCPT TO commands and message initiation.
    RecipientState
    Operations for responding to RCPT TO.
    ResetState
    Operations for responding to RSET command.
